klexdatr 0.1.1.9001

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

klexdatr 0.1.1.9001 Unreleased

  • Converted station and section to sf objects (not just with sfc vectors).
  • Imported sf package so no problem printing sfc vectors.

klexdatr 0.1.1 2020-11-01

  • Internal changes only.

klexdatr 0.1.0 2020-05-04

  • Converted data sets to tibbles with sfc vectors.

klexdatr 0.0.8 Unreleased 

## Minor changes
  - Updated Documentation

klexdatr 0.0.7 Unreleased 

## Minor changes
  - Used in Thorley and Andrusak (2017)

klexdatr 0.0.6 Unreleased 

## Major changes
  - Code rivers and West Arm as Lotic.
  - Code West Arm and Kootenay River as not Bounded.

klexdatr 0.0.5 Unreleased 

## Major changes
  - Keep all captures with acoustic tag and/or $100 reward

klexdatr 0.0.4 Unreleased 

## Minor changes
  - Exported lexr plotting functions in README

klexdatr 0.0.3 Unreleased 

## Major changes
  - Removed depth data as no resources to validate

klexdatr 0.0.2 Unreleased 

## Major changes
  - Added reward fish without acoustic tags

klexdatr 0.0.1 Unreleased 

## Major changes
  - Initial release

Developed by Joe Thorley, Greg Andrusak, Gary Pavan, Sarah Stephenson, Matt Neufeld, Jeff Burrows, Kerry Reed, Robyn Irvine, Harvey Andrusak, Habitat Conservation Trust Foundation, Fish and Wildlife Compensation Program, Freshwater Fish Society of BC, Bonneville Power Administration.
